hints.content:
Let's use place value blocks to help us solve!

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/a5a52760ee6ddf0902bcb447046ea7eda56739f3)

$489=\purpleD{4}\text{ hundreds} + \blueE{8}\text{ tens} + \maroonD{9}\text{ ones}$

If we break apart one hundred into tens, we will see that $1\text{ hundred}= 10\text{ tens}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/8c372c3bcf29ff756e7c045ec7186ec8af75d650)

So, $\purpleD1\text{ hundred} = \blueE{10}\text{ tens}$

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/17aac70ba720738c5ee62d4b4e06ff3e284ffc28)

$\blueE{40}\text{ tens} + \blueE8\text{ tens} +\maroonD9\text{ ones}= \blueE{48}\text{ tens}+\maroonD9\text{ ones}$

If we break apart one ten into ones, we will see that $1\text{ ten}= 10\text{ ones}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/e4fdf448967cc3f80b9adac27e4758efcc081e2c)

So, $\blueE{48}\text{ tens} = \maroonD{480}\text{ ones}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/be223fd95945f0d09828031c93a4e0ff43bf25a8)

$\maroonD{480}\text{ ones} + \maroonD9\text{ ones} = \maroonD{489}\text{ ones}$

question.content:
**Complete the equations.**

 |  | |  | | | | |
-: | -: | :-: | -: | -: | -: | :-: | -: | -: | -: 
$489 =$|$4$ |$\text{ hundreds}$ |$+$| $8$ | $\text{ tens}$ | $+$ | $9$ |$\text{ ones}$
$489=$ | $0$| $\text{ hundreds}$ |$+$ | [[☃ numeric-input 1]] | $\text{tens}$ |$+$ | $9$ | $\text{ ones}$
$489=$ | $0$| $\text{ hundreds}$ |$+$ | $0$| $\text{ tens}$ |$+$ | [[☃ numeric-input 2]] | $\text{ones}$
